EmailTemplate.name: Holiday Football Camp Starts Monday 30th September
EmailTemplate.subject: Holiday Football Camp Starts Monday 30th September
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Guangzhou Part of The British Schools Foundation
Dear Parents,<?xml:namespace prefix = o />
This is a reminder that our friends from the Guangzhou Football Academy will be holding a 'Holiday Football Camp' at the school next week.
If you or you friends would like to enrol your children or find out more information, PLEASE CLICK HERE.
Best wishes,
The British School of Guangzhou
World Class Education
